entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this morning then mainly cloudy. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. Forecast issued 08:04 AM CST Thursday 12 January 2023
